name: Zombie Haters
description:
Only those who hate zombies with all their heart survive after the apocalypse.

Get the team of like-minded people and clean the streets of filth! Shoot, explode and bomb the undead on city streets. Discover new territories and explore the big world. Huge crowds of zombies, a lot of secrets and true friends await you!

If you are tired of running around the city, but want to keep killing zombies - the game has an idle mode. Improve your team, unlock new haters - and they will fight with zombies even while you're sleeping!

FEATURES:
● Fight with hordes of zombies
● Explore the city and discover new territories
● Challenge bosses on the wanted list
● Action and idle modes in one game
● Save other haters
● Improve your team
